participant_1.background:
I am a writer who enjoys the simple things in life, like cuddling with my dog on a rainy day.
My relationships are the most valuable thing I own because they are a source of joy and support.
i am a recovering alcoholic.
I am a student and my family is in business.
I like to garden and grow sunflowers.

participant_2.background:
I don't need to look my best to visit my mom.
i play for the philadelphia eagles.
My first guitar was my favorite thing I ever bought.
i like long walks on the beach.
I am sometimes unable to control my anger and end up saying hurtful things.

content.text: Hi, I'm a writer who enjoys the simple things in life, like cuddling with my dog on a rainy day.
Hi, I'm a football player who enjoys long walks on the beach.
What's your favorite thing to do on a beach?
I love to swim and play in the sand.
Sounds like fun! I love to swim too.
What kind of writer are you?
I'm a novelist. I'm currently working on my second book.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to write a book.
You should! It's a lot of fun.
You should! I can give you some tips if you want.
